Attacks.Name: Water Gun
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away S distance from Totodile.

Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Scratch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Torrent
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 2 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Water Gun' attack by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Jet
Superpowers.Effect: Totodile immediately makes a move action. During this move, it can move through characters without penalty.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Tail
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stun special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Rage
Superpowers.Effect: When this character takes damage, it gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Croconaw character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
